name: Diastasis Recti
description: "Mother's Apron" is a common condition, defined as a separation of the 2 muscle bellies of rectus abdominis. It may persist for months or years postpartum and may require a surgery to be fixed.

images.description: Side and front view of Mother's Apron.

references.name: Diastasis recti abdominis during pregnancy and 12 months after childbirth: prevalence, risk factors and report of lumbopelvic pain

name: Perineal Lacerations
description: Vaginal Tearing is a laceration of the skin and other soft tissue structures separating the vagina from the anus. The condition varies widely in severity and 60-80% of affected persons will recover after 12 months, but it may result in permanent damage.

images.description: Illustration of first and second degree Perineal Tearing.
Illustration of third and fourth degree Perineal Tearing.

references.name: Perineal care
Repair of perineal and other lacerations associated with childbirth

consecutiveOutcomes.name: Clitoral Tearing
consecutiveOutcomes.description: A more severe case of Perineal Lacerations resulting in a torn clitoral hood. Yes, it's as bad as it sounds.

images.description: 3D render of a clitoris.

references.name: Traumatic Periurethral Tear And Posterior Dislocation Of External Urinary Meatus
I tore my clitoris giving birth

name: Harlequin Ichthyosis
description: Severe genetic disorder that affects the infant's skin.

images.description: Newborn suffering from the condition.

references.name: Harlequin Ichthyosis

name: Miscarriage
description: An early loss of a pregnancy, which usually happens in the first trimester. Between 10 and 15 percent of known pregnancies end this way.

images.description: Dead fetus positioned on a palm of a hand.

references.name: A Breakdown of Miscarriage Rates by Week

name: Preeclampsia
description: Complication of pregnancy which can cause high blood pressure and kidney or other organ damage. If left untreated, it can lead to serious or fatal complications.

images.description: A chart describing symptoms of Preeclampsia.

references.name: Preeclampsia Foundation FAQ
Preeclampsia

name: Postpartum Hemorrhage
description: Potentially dangerous blood clots that may travel to lungs. Causes approx. 8% of maternal deaths in developed countries.

images.description: Picture of a blood cloth travelling through bloodstream.

references.name: ‘I thought I was going to die’: Ashley’s postpartum hemorrhage story
Blood Clots After Birth: What You Need to Know

name: Maternal Mortality
description: You are dead. This is based on global mortality rate, so your chances may differ depending on where you live.

images.description: Photograph of a cemetary.

references.name: Historical Progress for Maternal Mortality (statistics for 2020)

name: Postpartum Depression
description: Chances vary significantly between countries. Generally lasts 3 to 6 months.

images.description: Photograph of a depressed person.

references.name: Postpartum Depression Statistics
Postpartum depression

consecutiveOutcomes.name: Postpartum Anxiety
consecutiveOutcomes.description: A feeling of fear, dread, and uneasiness. Affects roughly 75% of women with maternal depression.

images.description: Portrait of a girl with hands near her face.

references.name: Postpartum Depression Statistics
Anxiety

name: Postpartum OCD
description: Mental disorder in which a person has uncontrollable, reoccurring thoughts and/or behaviors. More common for persons with a past history of OCD.

images.description: Rendered image of a brain with activated regions.

references.name: Postpartum Depression Statistics
Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder

name: Postpartum Panic Disorder
description: The symptoms of postpartum panic disorder typically appear only a few days after giving birth. However, some women experience symptoms for the first time later, anytime during the first year of motherhood.

images.description: Photo of a red keyboard button with "PANIC" written on it.

references.name: Postpartum Depression Statistics

name: Postpartum PTSD
description: Symptoms include: flashbacks (reliving the trauma), bad dreams, frightening thoughts. If there were complications to pregnancy, the chances rise to around 30% for new mothers.

images.description: An illustration of a head with glitched brain.

references.name: Postpartum Depression Statistics
Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder

name: Postpartum Psychosis
description: A severe and potentially deadly disorder. Around 10% of postpartum psychosis cases result in suicide or infanticide.

images.description: Photo of a person with no face.

references.name: Postpartum Depression Statistics

name: Gestational Diabetes
description: Increases risk of developing type 2 diabetes later in life. Caused by too much glucode (sugar) in blood. Increases the risk of having a large baby.

images.description: Photo blood sugar measuring equipment.

references.name: Diabetes During Pregnancy

name: Weight Gain
description: On average, pregnant people gain 14.5 kg during pregnancy. 75% stay heavier post-pregnancy, including 47% who retain more than 4.5kg.

images.description: Photo of a person standing on scales.

references.name: Many Women Don't Lose Those Pregnancy Pounds

name: Vaginal Candidiasis
description: Yeast Infection. Symptoms include: itching or soreness, pain during sexual intercourse, pain or discomfort when urinating and abnormal vaginal discharge.

images.description: Microscope photo of yeast cells.

references.name: PURLs: Yeast infection in pregnancy? Think twice about fluconazole
Vaginal Candidiasis

name: Hemorrhoids
description: A painful swelling of a vein in the rectum.

images.description: Photo of Hemorrhoids.

references.name: Perianal Diseases in Pregnancy and After Childbirth: Frequency, Risk Factors, Impact on Women's Quality of Life and Treatment Methods
Common Conditions
What to Know About Pregnancy Hemorrhoids

name: Pregnancy Gingivitis
description: Treated with antibiotics and prescription-strength mouthwashes that target gum disease.

images.description: Photo of teeth with bleeding gums.

references.name: Bleeding gums during pregnancy

name: Stretch Marks
description: Indented streaks that appear on the abdomen, breasts, hips, buttocks or other places on the body.

images.description: Photo of stretch marks.

references.name: Stretch marks
What Are the Best Ways to Remove or Fade Stretch Marks Post-Pregnancy?

name: Telogen Effluvium
description: The most common period of hair loss occurs approximately three months after delivery. The rise in hormones during pregnancy keeps you from losing your hair. The normal hair loss that was delayed during pregnancy may fall out all at once.

images.description: Photo of hair on a hairbrush.

references.name: Pregnancy and Hair Loss

name: Twins
description: Chance of having twins depends on genetics, but on average 1 in 250 pregnancies are twins.

images.description: Photo of twins.

references.name: What are my chances of having twins?

name: Triplets
description: Having triples increases chances of other complications during pregnancy.

images.description: Photo of triplets.

references.name: Multiple Pregnancy and Birth: Twins, Triplets, and High Order Multiples (booklet)

name: Quadruplets
description: You won a reverse lottery! In the US, the average cost of raising a child through the age of 17 is $233,610, so now your wallet is lighter by almost one million.

images.description: A photo of quadruplets.

references.name: Multiple Pregnancy and Birth: Twins, Triplets, and High Order Multiples (booklet)
Cost of raising a child

name: Shaken Baby Syndrome
description: A serious brain injury resulting from forcefully shaking an infant or toddler, often resulting from stress post pregnancy.

images.description: Image of a baby being shaken.

references.name: Trends in shaken baby syndrome diagnosis codes among young children hospitalized for abuse

name: Anaemia
description: A lack enough healthy red blood cells to carry adequate oxygen to your body's tissues. Potentially life-threatening.

images.description: Photo of a hand of a person with anaemia.

references.name: Anaemia in women and children

name: Financial Issues
description: Pregnancy is expensive. Over a five-year period, 24% of pregnant and postpartum women in one study reported unmet health care needs due to cost.

images.description: Image of a mother with child surrounded by unpaid bills.

references.name: Study: Financial hardship prevalent during and after pregnancy

name: Domestic Violence
description: Nearly 20% of women experience violence during pregnancy, with pregnant adolescents and women with unintended pregnancies at an increased risk.

images.description: Image of a person covering their face.

references.name: Fact Sheet: Domestic Violence and Pregnancy

name: Dysgeusia
description: Majority of pregnant people report some change in taste during pregnancy. Most commonly perceived as a metallic taste, it can be felt even when not eating.

images.description: Photo of a tongue.

references.name: Metallic Taste During Pregnancy (Dysgeusia)

name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
description: Experts suggest CTS may be caused by hormone-related swelling during pregnancy. Symptoms include: numbness and tingling, throbbing sensation in hands, wrists and fingers, swollen fingers and problems performing fine motor skills.

images.description: Illustration of a hand with wrist bones and nerves shown.

references.name: What Causes Carpal Tunnel Syndrome During Pregnancy, and How’s It Treated?

name: Morning Sickness
description: Nausea and vomiting that happens during pregnancy. Despite its name, you can have morning sickness at any time of day.

images.description: Drawing of a woman vomiting into a bucket.

references.name: Morning Sickness

name: Pain after birth
description: Delivery is not the only time when you will feel pain, as it may persist for months after. Stock up on paracetamol, you're gonna need it.

images.description: A photo of a bunch of pills.

references.name: Severity of Acute Pain After Childbirth, but not Type of Delivery, Predicts Persistent Pain and Postpartum Depression

name: Pain during delivery
description: In a study conducted on 288 Swedish women, 41% of them considered delivery pain as the worst experience they have had.

images.description: A photo of doctors delivering a baby.

references.name: Women’s experience of pain during childbirth

name: Pelvic Floor Disorder
description: Includes a broad spectrum of conditions such as urinary incontinence, pelvic organ prolapse, or anal incontinence.

images.description: Illustration of pelvic muscles.

references.name: Prevalence and risk factors for pelvic floor disorders during early and late pregnancy in a cohort of Austrian women

name: Bigger Feet
description: On average, the arch height decreases, and in turn, the foot length increases between 2 and 10 millimeters (about 0.1 to 0.4 inches) during pregnancy and five months after giving birth.

images.description: Photograph of a long foot.

references.name: After Pregnancy, Women Have Bigger Feet

name: Regrets
description: Survey results vary greatly between countries, but approx. 7% of parents regret having children. On the other hand, only approx. 1% of people regret having an abortion.

images.description: Photo of a tired person.

references.name: How many parents regret having children and how it is linked to their personality and health: Two studies with national samples in Poland
Emotions and decision rightness over five years following an abortion: An examination of decision difficulty and abortion stigma
How many people actually regret having children?

name: Dissatisfaction with sexual life
description: Increased pain, hypoactive sexual desire disorder and other such conditions are to be expected in a pregnancy.

images.description: An illustration of two women in a intimate position.

references.name: Assessing the Impact of Pregnancy on Sexuality Using the Pregnancy Sexual Response Inventory
Sexual activity during pregnancy
